column3: The world was on fire and no one could save me but you
column4: 烈焰焚烧这世界，只有你能拯救我
column5: It's strange what desire will make foolish people do
column6: 奇怪的是欲望会驱使愚蠢的人做什么
column7: I never dreamed that I'd meet somebody like you
column8: 未曾企盼能遇见像你这样的人
column9: And I never dreamed that I'd lose somebody like you
column10: 更未曾想过我会失去像你这样的人
column12: I don't want to fall in love
column15: I don't want to fall in love
column20: What a wicked game to play
column21: to make me feel this way
column22: 你的游戏魅惑人心，让我不能自拔

column25: 你的一颦一笑让我神魂颠倒，魂牵梦绕
